page.title: 17LIFE_STYLES
page.content: My name is Karen Graham, I am 1O years old and live in the country. I get up at 7.5O,get ready for school and have breakfast.At 8.3O I wait for my friend and we go to school together At 9.OO the bell rings and school begins. Our teacher always takes the dinner numbers first.Some children stay for school dinners but others take packed lunches. During the morning we read,have music and maths.My favourite subject is Kent Maths. After lunch we have home economics.We do lots of interesting things.At the moment the girls are making blouses while the boys are making a model house.My mum always asks about school when I get home and I relax at home watching T.V. before going to Guides.
